Title: Prohibits the sale of vape products that resemble school supplies
Summary: Prohibits the sale of vape products that resemble school supplies, toys, or are packaged or advertised in any way to appeal to or target minors or the youth population.
LawCode: Amd ยง1399-cc, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of vape products that resemble school supplies
